4 survivors and killer face off in small horrorish arena where survivors have to repair 5/7 generators which each take 80s to fix. Killer has to find, injure, down and hook survivors while defending and sabotaging generators. Survivors have 2 "hooks/lives", if they are unhooked within 60s.


Each of (now about 18) Killers have their own ability to worsen your day, which can be aplified with addons.
Generally they have some downside to them, so if survivor has knowledge of the game they can negate these effects. #playBothSides
Since there are too many killers I can't really describe killer gameplay here.
Just enjoy and try different things :)


Survivors options are limited, however with a little bit of creativity while combining in-game mechanics with 4 players, you can get quite extreme results.
Some of the basic mechanics that will help you survive. 

Jumping through windows and throwing pallets. Duh. Every 80 horror movie. 
Safety of given window/pallet is decided by the length of the shorter wall attached to that window/pallet since killer can just walk around it.
Survivors have items available so they can heal, or even save survivors from Killer's grasp by sabotaging a hook, or blinding him.

It's an asymetric game so when a one side has a beginner member, it gets quite painful.
Community is quite toxic. Community consideres using many in-game mechanics as toxic.

Problematic situations include:
Killer standing close to hooked person, waiting out timer. #camping
-do nearby gens, -trade 1for1 last second
After unhooking killer goes for unhooked person. #tunneling
-block killers path -take a hit -take a hook if needed
